statements: SELECT * FROM user_activity_tracking
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity_tracking WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity_tracking ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM user_activity_tracking GROUP BY user_id HAVING activity_count > 3
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM user_activity_tracking
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity_tracking WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity_tracking WHERE activity_type = 'log in' AND activity_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM user_activity_tracking GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_activities > 10;
SELECT MAX(activity_timestamp) AS latest_activity FROM user_activity_tracking;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM user_activity_tracking ORDER BY activity_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, file_name, download_timestamp FROM file_download_history WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT user_id, count(*) AS download_count FROM file_download_history GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY download_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(download_timestamp) AS last_download FROM file_download_history GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, activity_type, activity_details FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type IN ('login', 'logout')
SELECT u.user_id, u.timestamp, f.file_name, f.download_timestamp FROM user_activity u INNER JOIN file_download_history f ON u.user_id = f.user_id ORDER BY u.timestamp
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM file_downloads ORDER BY download_timestamp DESC;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT file_name, download_timestamp FROM file_downloads ORDER BY download_timestamp ASC;
SELECT username, activity_type FROM users INNER JOIN user_activity ON users.user_id = user_activity.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(activity_id) AS total_activities FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_activities > 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT email, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT file_id, filename, file_size FROM files ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activity WHERE activity_id > 100;

SELECT users.username, files.filename, download_history.download_date FROM users JOIN download_history ON users.user_id = download_history.user_id JOIN files ON download_history.file_id = files.file_id;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT * FROM files WHERE file_size > 1000
SELECT username, email FROM users INNER JOIN user_activity ON users.user_id = user_activity.user_id
SELECT filename, file_type FROM files WHERE file_type = 'image'
SELECT * FROM user_activity;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT activity_id, activity_description FROM activity_details ORDER BY activity_id DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM file_details WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT report_type, report_timestamp FROM analytics_report WHERE report_type = 'monthly';
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM file_details WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM activity_details ORDER BY activity_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, download_timestamp FROM file_downloads WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY download_timestamp ASC;
SELECT report_type, report_timestamp FROM analytics_report WHERE report_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY report_timestamp DESC;
